name: Stretching Over It
description:
A very short platformer game about getting your hat back after being blown away to the top of a Mountain.

CONTROLS:

Left and Right Arrow Keys - Move

Up and Down Arrow Keys - Stretch

Shift -Jump

CREDITS:

Game for 'My First Game Jam: Winter 2022'

Draw an Stickman EPIC 1 - Menu

Draw an Stickman EPIC 1 - Draw a Stickman

Castle Crashers - Flutey

TLOZ: Link's Awekening - Tal Tal Heights
